title: Subpart 374-3 - Standards for Universal Wastes
content:
Subpart 374-3 - Standards for Universal Wastes

State Regulations
§ 374-3.1 - General requirements
§ 374-3.2 - Standards for small quantity handlers of universal waste
§ 374-3.3 - Standards for large quantity handlers of universal waste
§ 374-3.4 - Standards for universal waste transporters
§ 374-3.5 - Standards for destination facilities
§ 374-3.6 - Import requirements
§ 374-3.7 - Petitions to include other wastes under this subpart

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
